subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ David Wright and Matt Harvey made the N.L. squad for the July 16 game at Citi Field. Robinson Cano and Mariano Rivera will represent the Yankees.
snippet: The Mets’ David Wright and Matt Harvey made the N.L. squad for the July 16 game at Citi Field. Robinson Cano and Mariano Rivera will represent the Yankees.
